servinfo.title: Only one door can not be locked / unlocked

item.ptxt: Use of SUZUKI scan tool makes it easy to check whether a faulty condition is on the input side or output side of BCM. For checking procedure, refer to “Diagnosis Using Output Test Function of SUZUKI Scan Tool” under Scan Tool Data .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: Only one door can not be locked / unlocked

action.ptxt: Check actuator referring to Power Door Lock Actuator Inspection (If Equipped) .

ps.ptxt: Wiring harness connected to applicable door lock actuator faulty

action.ptxt: Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
